cover.subtitle: ...and, for the occasion, some of our collaborators are sharing their favorite music with you!

meta.title: Happy New Mix 2024 by Les-Tilleuls.coop
meta.description: Les-Tilleuls.coop wishes you a 2024 filled with music!

opengraph.title: Happy New Mix 2024 - Les-Tilleuls.coop
opengraph.description: Rock, rap, or even electro: kick off 2024 by listening to playlists curated by our team!

tapes.title: Code Lover
tapes.subtitle: Kevin's playlist
tapes.description: FrankenPHP, API Platform, Symfony... There is no downtime for Kévin and his passion for coding! Get ready to dive into a sonic universe reserved for enthusiasts of the binary language.

tapes.title: Reggae for life
tapes.subtitle: Soyuka's playlist
tapes.description: When the release manager of API Platform handles the issues or pull requests of your favorite framework, it is always accompanied by a playlist with slow and rhythmic sounds from Jamaica. Relax and now fill your ears with good vibes.

tapes.title: Walking on a dream
tapes.subtitle: Justine's playlist
tapes.description: Justine, a former bookstore employee, now juggles with JavaScript libraries. Through her playlist, she invites you into the dreamlike world that she listens to every day.

tapes.title: Na, alles gut?
tapes.subtitle: Jérôme's playlist
tapes.description: Jérôme is a back-end developer, and his passion, after astronomy, is speaking and learning German. Explore classic German pop music with his playlist!

tapes.title: Spider addict
tapes.subtitle: Laury's playlist
tapes.description: Laury is our lead designer, and her passion is to draw different versions of Webby, the spider mascot of API Platform. Discover her playlist, not recommended for arachnophobes.

tapes.title: 100% live
tapes.subtitle: Cécile's playlist
tapes.description: Cécile is our events manager, and we feel her passion for the adrenaline of live events every day. Beware: this playlist is reserved for thrill-seekers!

tapes.title: Sang et or
tapes.subtitle: Thomas's playlist
tapes.description: When Thomas is not on the phone or in a client meeting, he listens to classics from his native region. Let's enjoy the best sounds of Lille and its area!

tapes.title: Mix and match
tapes.subtitle: Albin's playlist
tapes.description: If we were to define Albin's playlist with one adjective, it would be eclecticism. Browse through these classics of pop, electro, and rock from the last few decades with him.

tapes.title: Full Metal SRE
tapes.subtitle: Julien's playlist
tapes.description: Julien is not just a K8s and GCP enthusiast; he's also a heavy metal fan! Today, he unveils an exclusive playlist where pop songs take on a whole new dimension through metal covers.

tapes.title: Down under
tapes.subtitle: Allison's playlist
tapes.description: Did you know that Allison spends part of the year in Australia? Let's revisit classics from the land Down Under with this pop and sunny playlist.

tapes.title: Many moods
tapes.subtitle: Grégoire's playlist
tapes.description: The playlist of Grégoire, our CTO, reflects all the emotions he can experience during a workday. Fasten your seatbelt and get ready for a roller coaster of bass and vocals!
